meanings.definition: Superlative form of 'rad', meaning extremely cool or excellent.
meanings.sent1: The skateboard trick he did was the raddest one I've ever seen!
meanings.sent2: She wore the raddest outfit to the party last night.
meanings.sent3: His dance moves were so raddest that everyone couldn't help but smile.
meanings.sent4: The raddest sunset painted the sky in vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: The raddest song played, and everyone started dancing joyfully.

meanings.sent1: The storm last night was the raddest we've experienced in years.
meanings.sent2: Their plan to climb the mountain was the raddest idea ever.
meanings.sent3: The raddest roller coaster made everyone scream with excitement.
meanings.sent4: The raddest decision they made was to travel the world together.
meanings.sent5: The raddest adventure awaited them at the top of the mountain.
